metadata.Title: CVE-2021-43818 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: lxml is a library for processing XML and HTML in the Python language. Prior to version 4.6.5, the HTML Cleaner in lxml.html lets certain crafted script content pass through, as well as script content in SVG files embedded using data URIs. Users that employ the HTML cleaner in a security relevant context should upgrade to lxml 4.6.5 to receive a patch. There are no known workarounds available.

criterions.comment: lxml: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
